showerReviews.reviewText:
Not a bad Love‚Äôs. Clean, tidy, no major complaints on that front.
But there‚Äôs this weird ritual ‚Äî every time the afternoon shift kicks in, suddenly the hot water tap near the coffee machines becomes ‚Äúout of service.‚Äù ‚Ä¶
Nice. Clean location, showers hot and clean. Not so much truck parking but just got here on time. Staff friendly. Well stocked area. Definitely your location would return your again.
David McleanLocal Guide ¬∑ 836 reviews ¬∑ 963 photos
Clean showers, hot water, alot of pressure. Friendly people. Repaie Shop, and as always good service.

Very poor service üëéüèº ,I wasn't allowed to take a shower in the morning, and they told me I had to bring the card in person, but I don't know where it is in the truck. All the information is on my phone. For example, there are no such problems with the Pilot, so think carefully before choosing ‚Ä¶

Today (Aug 13, 2025), I bought shampoo and paid before heading to my shower. An employee, not a cashier or security, loudly accused me of stealing in front of everyone without checking with the cashier first. after shower Even after ‚Ä¶

What a great place for travelers and for truckers. The store is immaculate bathrooms, showers and main grocery area. They have pretty much everything one would need for their travels. Each employee I encountered was friendly and very ‚Ä¶

This is a 17 dollar shower.
Barely any water pressure, the knob to switch shower heads is apparently broken because no mater which way you set it you get a weak stream out both shower ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: This place use to be a gem. Now its trash. Employees are trash. Parking lot is trash. Food is trash. Showers are trash. I wish I could find one nice thing to say about this place but im coming up blank. Had to edit. I left one thing out. The entire place smells like trash. You can smell it before you pull in the parking lot.

Not a bad little truck stop. After reading the reviews, i was skeptical, but it wasn't bad. I've been trucking a long time. I've seen some nasty truck stops. I'd say this one's about a five out of ten. You want to bring your own food, but the showers were ten bucks and clean.
Nice gas station has all that you‚Äôll need for snacks and pleasure! Lots of parking and ada compliant. The place was mostly clean the men‚Äôs bathroom needs some cleaning attention.
Not sure what happened to this place. It used to be a great trick stop to stop at, one that you could count on being clean and welcoming. Not so much anymore, sadly. ‚Ä¶

Ladies, please use caution when stopping here to use the restroom!

This station was always my go-to stop on the way to/from Madison. Usually for ‚Ä¶

Black middle age guy took a poop and didnt wash his hands. Left and went back to checking out people and touched my stuff and a family‚Äôs food with their kid. I deep cleaned my drink but feel bad for that family. This is unacceptable

It's an older truck stop, but there's quite a bit of parking. The store has the normal truckstop items and there is also Chester's chicken inside. I was disappointed in their pet policy. The bathrooms all have electric dryers, so there are ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: A mom & pop travel plaza right off of US 151N & 26s here in waaupun, WI. It's about 10 miles from the walmart DC in beaver Dam, WI. 4 diesel islands, a good size lot for truck parking. Lot is clean and well maintained. Sit down restaurant ‚Ä¶

What a gem!!
Super nice and clean local truck stop with nice restaurants. They also sells verity of tasty frozen pot pie, breakfast burrito, pizza‚Ä¶ etc. ‚Ä¶
Kind of high on price but that container is dish washer safe üòÇ for sure reusable ‚Ä¶

Awesome little truck stop ample truck parking and great breakfast and very clean envoronment and friendly staff. The trucking industry needs more truck stops like this. Like it used to be when I was a young man starting out driving, the big ‚Ä¶

Finding this place is a Lucky one at night when you need to take 10 hrs break as a CDL driver. Nice and clean as others comment. This Truck Stop seems to be a new one, and it just 10 miles away from Walmart DC, so if you have Load to get or ‚Ä¶
Plenty of room to park with a clean store & restroom with nice folks. The coffee is good as are the Sausage Egg and Hash Brown Burritos. The restaurant looked nice too.

Fantastic lil maw n paw truck stop. It has nice showers, a place to do laundry and a 10 thumbs üëç up cafe attached. We had breakfast and lunch there and it was so good that we bought to go chili and chicken pot pie soup to go for lunch the next day.  Absolutely fabulous lil gem of a place. We will definitely be back. üòäüëèüëè ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ There is 1 shower here which is convenient and it was very clean. They do provide a fresh towel and wash cloth. ‚Ä¶

Great crew and nice shower available for $8.00.
Parking $10.00 after 4 hours.
Excellent restaurant next door home cooking favorite Foods from 6am-3pm!
5 minutes away from Ameicold Appleton Wisconsin

Very friendly staff. The shower was well cleaned and not too small. The store is well kept and stocked. Limited hours but it gives the traditional values vibe. Diner Nextdoor is probably fantastic because it‚Äôs always full!
Only about 15 parking spots at $10 daily, shower price 8 or 10 dollars nice store, great dinner next door at good prices
This place is great. Really nice employees and shower is clean. They're pretty cheap on prices for sure
Nice and friendly staff $8 for shower. They only have one but it nice and clean with Hot waterü§ó. Truck parking for about 20 trucks behind the diner. It close at 11pm. ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Every time I get a car wash from here, it smells like rotten eggs and then the smell will stay in the car for a couple days. Location is convenient but I only use this one when necessary. And there is no dryer countdown timer.
2 clean showers that currently cost $7.50 with two towels about 15 spots no pull throughs big lot also truck wash in lot pretty clean and nice people! 24/7 very semi friendly

Great place with everything you would need from a gas station. But the car wash water at this location smells TERRIBLE. I have the Flash pass card and none of the other car washes grand central has smell like this.
Quick and easy fueling for all vehicles. Clean restrooms and lounge area. Car wash worked well. They also sell Live Bait.
Very nice place. Got gas and used the restroom.

A step back in time! At least on the outside. The inside is clean, well maintained, stocked and modern. Plenty of car/truck/RV parking and handicap accessible spaces. On the menu, McDonald's, Subway, Taco Bell is next door, Culver's is ‚Ä¶

But it's actually 4 to 5 stars downstairs because it's clean bright nice Subway nice McDonald's some pretty good prices good freezer section.
Using this truck stop more than a decade. New management has done great job in changing showers and driver lounge. Best maintained showers ever, with great price and hot water.
Plenty of parking. McDonald‚Äôs and subway inside. 4 diesel pumps for semis. Showers too. Pay for dropped trailers. Several restaurants within walking distance

New owners so now they charge for parking. I think it‚Äôs $15.00. I bought a $12.00 shower and got the parking for free. Nice shower. I would suggest bring your own towels. Lots of good near by walking distance. Workers there are really nice.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ We spent the night in the RV lot after seeking shelter from dangerous winds & possible severe t-storms. We were able to do laundry & shower,  All very clean.  The laundry was very clean & reasonably priced... would definitely recommend! A ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ has many hidden amenities.  A great place for everyone but especially for truckers, and long haulers, as they have laundry and shower facilities as well as a dentist, barber, work out facilities and so much more! We love stopping on our ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ entertainment. There‚Äôs a huge convenience store for your snack needs and a diner that serves both menu items and a buffet. Didn‚Äôt get a shower there but the restrooms were clean. The place has 3 floors that includes a barber. There‚Äôs also ‚Ä¶

Pretty big with lots to do. Has a shower area. Tons of restaurants. Stuff for kids to explore and see. Has a chiropractor on site. This place has leveled up in the last few years by adding tons of stuff. ‚Ä¶

Hadn't been here in years. Went to take a shower on Palm Sunday and Pastor Daryl was giving a sermon in the lounge in front of the showers. The Lord told me to stay. Was warm & friendly service. Then I met with the pastor for 4 hours that ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ of necessities and snacks. Spend some time wandering around the main store area, there's plenty to see. Clean restrooms and shower. Navigate through the various gift shops located throughout the facility. You can also get customized ‚Ä¶

World‚Äôs biggest truck stop. Besides truck parking which can park 900 trucks you have a restaurant, theatre, shower rooms, lounge, convince stores. Its is spread in 75 acres. If I am not wrong you can park here for free. It has fuel station ‚Ä¶

This place is huge. There‚Äôs a food court inside the truck stop. Upstairs there are dentist, chiropractor, shower, laundry, hair salon. And the truck section of stuff takes up half of the place. Parking was no problem. There‚Äôs also tesla ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ You can take a shower, get a haircut, and watch a movie. There's even a dentist and a chiropractor. ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Great Experience here. Nice and clean travel plaza in New London, WI. They have taco bell open till 2 am. Ample parking spots. Would love to visit again.

You can‚Äôt call yourself a travel plaza and have a truck lounge and showers for truck drivers and NOT be open all night!! Travel plazas such as this are open 24/7. Or at least get new diesel pumps so drivers can fuel using cards.

Under new ownership as of this past year - a very well run and kept store. Decent snack selection, showers for truckers, plenty of parking and there's even a taco bell next door and thats one of the cleaner ones I've eaten at

The staff has excellent customer service. The BBO Pull Pork sandwich is awesome!!!! It is near Dollar Tree, Dollar General, Subway, McDonald's, Walgreens, and Walmart. There is a Taco Bell inside the store. Excellent place for truckers as well. They do have showers however laundromat is down the street.
15$ per person for a shower ? Is that normal out here? Quality inn is down the street for 66$ for a room .. tacobell was refreshing to see..
